document_data.name: Ohlo's Mystic Devices
document_data.mainbody: '''Ohlo's Mystic Devices''' was a small shop that dealt in magical miscellany in the city of [[Phlan]] of the [[Moonsea]] region in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1350}}, Ohlo's Mystic Devices had a signage over its door inviting customers inside. At the time, the proprietor of the establishment was a young, yet distinguished woman. Her inventory consisted of [[cleric]] and [[wizard]] [[scroll]]s, ''[[potions of healing]]'', ''[[potions of speed]]'', a precious ''[[wand of magic missiles]]'', ''[[ring]]s and [[cloak]]s of protection'', and a set of ''[[bracers of defense]].''
